link.synopsis: As a bouncer for the Sladetown Carnival, tough-as-nails Wyatt Earp III (Chad Everett) puts up with a lot of abuse, but it's nothing compared to the grief he gets from his shotgun-toting bounty hunter mother, Amanda, and his con artist brother, Evan. Saddled with an eccentric family and the carny lifestyle, Wyatt and his teenage son try their best to maintain some semblance of normalcy. Mimi Rogers and Jim Varney co-star in this zany comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Teaser / Frankie & Johnnie Were Lovers
The Longshot / They Went That-A-Way & That-A-Way

link.synopsis: Move over Herbie, Superbug is on the loose and ready to capture a group of big-time gangsters. In this comedy adventure, peppy Volkswagen Superbug shows off his repertoire of tricks, including flying, climbing, swimming and fighting the baddies. NFL great Jim Brown and Gerd Dewner co-star in this family-friendly film, chock-full of high-octane excitement from the toughest hero of the highways.
link.title: synopsis
Sid the Science Kid: The Bug Club
Warner Bros. Home Entertainment Presents: Academy Awards' Animation Collection: 15 Winners
Cats & Dogs: The Revenge of Kitty Galore
The Little Rascals: Collector's Edition III
Cartoons That Time Forgot: Van Beuren Studios
The Adventures of Elmo in Grouchland
All About Trucks & All About Monster Trucks
Motorized Madness: Exploring the World of Machines
The Looney Tunes Golden Collection: Vol. 6
Little Cars in the Great Race

link.synopsis: Railroad scion Jeff Hillington (Douglas Fairbanks) is obsessed with the Old West, and when his father sends him to Bitter Creek, Ariz., on business, he expects a wild frontier town. Wanting to please the wealthy potential resident, the locals pretend to be just that. But even with blanks replacing bullets, the charade turns into a real-life fiasco -- and now Jeff must save the day using every Western cliché he knows in this 1917 silent comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The Mark of Zorro / Don Q: Son of Zorro
With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
Crooked River / Colorado Ranger / Fast on the Draw
Earth / The End of St. Petersburg / Chess Fever

The Deadly Trackers / Man in the Wilderness
Robert Benchley and the Knights of the Algonquin
Arbuckle & Keaton: The Original Comique Paramount Shorts 1917-1920: Vol. 1
Monty Python and the Holy Grail

link.synopsis: "Who's on First?" "Hole in the Wall," "Jonah and the Whale," "Army Drill" and "Mustard" are just a few of the Abbott and Costello comic masterpieces found in this hilarious compilation. Taken from their many hosting appearances on TV's "The Colgate Comedy Hour" in the 1950s, these classic routines feature the vaudevillian duo at their finest, with Bud playing the snide straight man to Lou's bumbling nincompoop.
link.title: synopsis
Abbott and Costello Funniest Routines: Vol. 2
The Best of the Abbott and Costello Comedy Hour

link.synopsis: Vowing to change his ways and win his girlfriend's hand in marriage, a notorious thief with sticky fingers (Leslie Phillips) checks into a 12-step program run by a crafty ex-con (Stanley Baxter). But will his new job as a department store Santa prove too tempting for lasting reform? Oscar winner Julie Christie co-stars in this black-and-white comedy classic, one of her earliest film appearances.
link.title: synopsis
Counterspy Meets Scotland Yard / Radar Secret Service / Motor Patrol
The Oblong Box / Scream and Scream Again: Double Feature
Peter Cook & Dudley Moore: The Best of... What's Left of... Not Only... But Also...
I Met Him in Paris / Bluebeard's Eighth Wife
Smothers Brothers Comedy Hour: The Best of Season 3

The Heart Is a Lonely Hunter
Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines
The Wrong Arm of the Law
Chamber of Horrors / The Brides of Fu Manchu
The Pure Hell of St. Trinian's
The Knack...and How to Get It

link.synopsis: Oscar-winning director Robert Youngson packs three decades of fun into one convenient package with this compilation of classic black-and-white comedy clips featuring Charlie Chaplin, Buster Keaton and Laurel and Hardy. Selections include scenes from The Floorwalker (1916), The Pawnshop (1916), The Rink (1916), Easy Street (1917), Daydreams (1922), The Balloonatic (1923), The Lucky Dog (1921) and Smile Please (1924).
link.title: synopsis
The First Kings of Comedy Collection
Kings of Comedy: Masters of the Silent Screen
Time Machine: When Cowboys Were King
Make 'Em Laugh: The Funny Business of America
Errol Morris' First Person: The Complete Series
The Fighting Redhead / Cowboy and the Prizefighter
The Little Tramp: The Charlie Chaplin Collection
Francis the Talking Mule / Francis Goes to the Races
It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
Snow White and the Three Stooges

The Harold Lloyd Comedy Collection: Vol. 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Stan Laurel Collection: Vol. 2
Slapstick Symposium: The Harold Lloyd Collection

link.synopsis: While writing his memoirs, a young man (Cort Donovan) reflects on his on-again, off-again relationship with his former lover, Ira (Luke Aulwurm), and Ira's tumultuous relationship with his father (Larry Filas). Toby Ross -- a director most often associated with hardcore gay films from the 1970s and '80s -- shows his softer side with this bittersweet but heartwarming comedy about family, friends and finding unconditional love.
link.title: synopsis
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
The Man You Had in Mind
The Young, the Gay and the Restless

link.synopsis: This thematic comedy trilogy from collaborators Tim Firth, Jonathan Harvey and Simon Nye follows a cast of characters searching for a way to break free from the mental and emotional restraints they impose upon themselves. Von Trapped follows an unstable fan of The Sound of Music; Beauty concerns an ugly aristocrat ashamed of his appearance; and King of Fridges centers on an overzealous manager at odds with an elderly trainee.
link.title: synopsis
The Fall and Rise of Reginald Perrin: The Complete Series
Open All Hours: The Complete Series
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy
The Vicar of Dibley: 10th Anniversary Specials
The Worst Week of My Life
Extras: The Extra Special Series Finale
To the Manor Born: Silver Wedding Anniversary
The Best of So Graham Norton

link.synopsis: Reality, dreams and nightmares swirl together in this surreal tale of French teen Balise, who's convinced he'll die if he falls asleep, so he goes on the run through the countryside while being chased by a detective and various hit men. Alain Guiraudie's beguiling debut feature swerves unpredictably between road movie, coming-of-age comedy, gangster and other genres. The Village Voice called it "one of the best French films of recent years."
link.title: synopsis
Jeanne Dielman, 23 Quai du Commerce, 1080 Bruxelles
Ali Zaoua: Prince of the Streets
The Romance of Astrea and Celadon
The Diving Bell and the Butterfly

link.synopsis: When a bookie on the run (Scott Brady) falls for a pretty country songbird (Mitzi Gaynor), he'll do anything to help her make it big -- including a stint in jail to pay for his crimes. But will the tough guy's sacrifice of the heart pay off when it comes to his girlfriend's singing career? Watch for a young Charles Bronson playing a waiter in this snappy musical comedy based on several Damon Runyon short stories.
link.title: synopsis
There's No Business Like Show Business
With a Song in My Heart
By the Light of the Silvery Moon
Showtime USA: Kentucky Jubilee / The Kid from Gower Gulch
Jayne Mansfield Collection: The Girl Can't Help It

link.synopsis: The Statler Brothers sing hits such as "Class of '57," "Carry Me Back" and "Whatever Happened to Randolph Scott?" as well as "How Great Thou Art" and other gospel tunes in this collection of songs and comedy sketches from their weekly variety show. Before becoming well-loved country legends and hosting "The Statler Brothers Show," the Grammy Award-winning group started out as singing backup for Johnny Cash.
link.title: synopsis
Asleep at the Wheel: Live from Austin TX
Merle Haggard: Live from Austin, TX
Opry Video Classics: Hall of Fame
Lost Concerts Series: Presley & Cash: The Road Show
Grand Ole Opry at Carnegie Hall

Ralph Emery: Country Legend's Series: Vol. 1

link.synopsis: Academy Award-nominated screenwriter Nia Vardalos, who had a huge hit with her debut screenplay, My Big Fat Greek Wedding, opens up to host Mike De Luca in a frank discussion. She shares her thoughts about the style of laughter she prefers, how her involvement with the comedy troupe Second City improved her writing and acting skills, and what she considers the toughest part of writing.
link.title: synopsis
The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Simon Kinberg
The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Callie Khouri
The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Nick Kazan
The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriters Alex Kurtzman and Roberto Orci
Untamable Angélique / Angélique and the Sultan
Samantha Brown: Passport to Great Weekends
The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Billy Ray
The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter John Hamburg

Popular Mechanics: The New Technology of War
Moon Race: The History of Apollo: Vol. 1

title.regular: The Dialogue: An Interview with Screenwriter Nia Vardalos

link.synopsis: The perils of the Los Angeles dating scene converge in the aisles of a local supermarket, where singles pick up groceries -- and one another -- in this charming comedy from writer-director Charlie Loventhal. But shopping for food is easy compared to shopping for a soul mate, as these young lovers quickly learn. The talented ensemble cast includes Julian McMahon, Missi Pyle, Elizabeth Berkley, Alan Tudyk and Aisha Tyler.
link.title: synopsis
Michael Jackson: Fan's Camera Footage, By Fans for Fans

link.synopsis: Secret agent Starrbooty (RuPaul) goes undercover as a hooker when her long-standing archrival Annaka Manners (Candis Cayne) kidnaps her niece in this outrageously kitschy comedy featuring plenty of wacky characters, insane costumes and kinky fun. While dealing with the fact that she's got to go all the way with her johns or risk, er, blowing her cover, Starrbooty learns some startling information about her real identity.
link.title: synopsis
Another Gay Sequel: Gays Gone Wild!
Everything You Wanted to Know About Gay Porn Stars
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
Otto; or, Up With Dead People
Eating Out: All You Can Eat
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
The Decline of the American Empire

link.synopsis: Adapted from the Carol Lynn Pearson play, writer-director McKay Daines's romantic comedy explores the depths life and love through the intertwining stories of three couples at a church dance on the Harvard campus. With stellar performances from an outstanding ensemble cast, this intelligently scripted film stars Michael Flynn, K.C. Clyde, Kari Hawker, Monique Lanier, Joyce Cohen and Scott Christopher.
link.title: synopsis
Belle and the Beast: A Christian Romance
The Book of Mormon Movie: Vol. 1: The Journey
Rockwell: A Legend of the Wild West

link.synopsis: Covering a typical production week -- from Monday-morning pitch meetings through the live Saturday performance -- this program examines the fast pace and brilliant talent that goes into creating one of America's most-loved sketch comedy shows. Learn why some skits make it while others get the axe, get a peek behind the scenes, and hear insights from former cast members Adam Sandler, Molly Shannon, Al Franken, Chevy Chase and others.
link.title: synopsis
Saturday Night Live: Lost & Found: SNL in the 80's
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Amy Poehler
Saturday Night Live: Live from New York: The First 5 Years
Saturday Night Live: The Best of '06/'07
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Phil Hartman
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Jon Lovitz
Biography: Dean Martin - Everybody Loves Somebody
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Alec Baldwin
Saturday Night Live: 25 Years of Music
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Cheri Oteri
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Commercial Parodies
Passport to Europe: England, Ireland & Scotland
Saving a Species: Gorillas on the Brink
Decoding the Past: Secrets of the Dollar Bill
NBC News Presents: Secrets to the Code
NBC News Presents: Deep Throat: The Full Story of Watergate

link.synopsis: When struggling actor Papito learns that the wealthy Mr. Arturo has fallen for his girlfriend, Yoli, he sees dollar signs. Yoli seduces Arturo in hopes of marrying him for his money, but the plan goes belly up when he dies before vows are exchanged. Now, Yoli's family wants to team up with the scheming Papito. Together, they devise a hilarious way for Yoli to steal Arturo's inheritance. Nothing is what it seems in this offbeat comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Vidas Privadas / Pantaleon Y Las Visitadores
Mi Mujer es La Que Manda
Dios los Junta y Ellos Se Separan
Donde Quedo La Abuela? El Viaje De La Nonna

link.synopsis: Oscar, Eduardo and Ruben are father, son and grandson, all learning about the amusing ups and downs of love in its many forms, from the first throes of infatuation to the bliss of fully realized mature love that looks beyond the self. Through new romances and failed relationships, each man discovers that love can make us do strange things indeed. Jaime Barbini, Miguel Varoni and Juan Fernando Sánchez star in this charming, insightful comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Vidas Privadas / Pantaleon Y Las Visitadores

title.regular: Mi Abuelo Mi Papa y Yo
title.short: Mi Abuelo Mi Papa y Yo

link.synopsis: When two bumbling crooks inadvertently kill a drug courier in Havana, they find themselves with a small fortune in cocaine. Will this be their ticket to the big time, or will the drug dealers seeking the missing coke end their criminal ambitions? Directed by Guido Giansoldati, this action-laden black comedy stars Victor Molina, Lorenzo Castillo, Fabio Sartor and Luis Alberto Garcia.
link.title: synopsis
La Quinta Estacion: Directo Desde Madrid
Si Honraras a Tu Coca Madre
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Los Tres Garcia
1888: El Extraordinario Viaje de la Santa Isabel

link.synopsis: Beloved comedy duo Dean Martin and Jerry Lewis team up for hilarity in this pair of wacky classics directed by George Marshall and Norman Taurog, playing two luckless joes on the lam and two golfers. In Scared Stiff, Martin and Lewis wind up in a spooky castle where they encounter a host of creepy creatures. Then, a talented golfer (Lewis) who suffers from stage fright manages to land a spot on the PGA tour -- as another athlete's (Martin) caddy.
link.title: synopsis
My Friend Irma / My Friend Irma Goes West
Don't Raise the Bridge, Lower the River
Martin & Lewis: At War with the Army
Sorrowful Jones / The Paleface: Double Feature
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 3: Still Laughing
It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
Snow White and the Three Stooges
Laurel & Hardy: Air Raid Wardens / Nothing But Trouble
Dean Martin & Jerry Lewis: Vol. 2: When Television Was Funny
Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number!
Those Daring Young Men in Their Jaunty Jalopies

link.synopsis: In this hit animated series from the early days of Comedy Central, therapist Dr. Katz (voiced by Jonathan Katz) doles out advice to his troubled patients while dealing with his sarcastic receptionist Laura and charming slacker son Ben. Katz treats the neuroses of plenty of top comic performers -- most of them playing themselves -- including Ray Romano, Ben Stiller, Julia Louis-Dreyfus, Janeane Garofalo, Jon Stewart, Conan O'Brien and many more.
link.title: synopsis
Space Ghost Coast to Coast: Vol. 1
Not Just the Best of the Larry Sanders Show

Knowing Me Knowing You with Alan Partridge: The Complete Series
Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Dead Talk Back

title.regular: Dr. Katz: Professional Therapist: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: View the all-time greatest crank calls from this side-splittingly funny Comedy Central television show that features the vocal talents of such hilarious comedians as Jimmy Kimmel, Wanda Sykes, Adam Carolla, Tracy Morgan and Sarah Silverman. Included are such memorable moments as Special Ed yelling "I got mail" 48 times in one call and Hadassah asking the toughest questions imaginable about poop.
link.title: synopsis
Why We Laugh: Black Comedians on Black Comedy
Roast of Bob Saget: Uncensored Extended

Family Guy Presents: Stewie Griffin: The Untold Story
Open All Hours: The Complete Series

link.synopsis: When an average Joe named Randy (Ray McKinnon) finds himself in debt to the mob, an eccentric Italian goon (Walton Goggins) with a penchant for high fashion is sent to collect. Adding to the mix in this offbeat comedy are Randy's colorful wife and gay twin brother. Writer-director McKinnon's quirky crime caper unfolds with a dry wit and pace that matches life in suburban Atlanta.
link.title: synopsis
Jyu-Oh-Sei: Planet of the Beast King

link.synopsis: The original cast of The Singles Ward returns for another round of gospel-inspired hilarity in this follow-up comedy that was five years in the making. After meeting the girl of his dreams -- a pious beauty named Christine (Erin Chambers) -- Dallen Martin (Kirby Heyborne) promptly meets her family, only to learn that his fiancée's charms are merely a matter of nature winning out over nurture.
link.title: synopsis
The Book of Mormon Movie: Vol. 1: The Journey
The Work and the Glory III: A House Divided
The Work and the Glory: American Zion
Belle and the Beast: A Christian Romance
Don't Touch If You Ain't Prayed 2

link.synopsis: Set in the lush countryside surrounding Ooty, this engaging comedy follows ne'er-do-well Chandru (Vivek), who's frittered away a huge sum from his grandfather (Radha Ravi) while spinning tales about earning big returns on the money. When Grandpa decides to come for a visit -- with five granddaughters in tow -- Chandru asks to borrow the estate of rich friend Rakesh (Shaam). But trouble arises when he falls for Chandru's cousin (Trisha Krishnan).
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this romantic comedy, bachelor Dave (Everett Phillips Jr.) leads a wretched life devoid of meaning, suffering deep loneliness as he attempts to connect with women. Unfortunately, his insistence on finding a woman with perfect feet makes his quest even more daunting. Dave's clumsy, inappropriate social skills tend to frighten prospective dates right off the bat, but he persists, determined to find Ms. Right. Elena Roth and Arina Gray co-star.
link.title: synopsis
House of Wax / The Mystery of the Wax Museum
The Man Who Came to Dinner
The Lives of a Bengal Lancer
How to Go Out on a Date in Queens
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date

link.synopsis: Proving that family friendly and funny aren't incompatible concepts, Emmy-winning actor and comedian Tim Conway hosts this laugh-out-loud performance featuring stand-up routines by five of the wittiest quipsters on the comedy scene. "Saturday Night Live" alumna Victoria Jackson, Bone Hampton, Taylor Mason, Thor Ramsey and Dan Nainan join Conway (who for the first time in years hauls out his "Old Man" character) in this Hollywood yuk-fest.
link.title: synopsis
Chonda Pierce: A Piece of My Mind
Dorf Da Bingo King / Dorf and the First Games of Mt. Olympus
The Longshot / They Went That-A-Way & That-A-Way
Ken Davis: Is It Just Me?
Ken Davis Live: I'm Not Okay
Anita Renfroe: It's Probably Just My Thyroid
Best of Mark Lowry & Bill Gaither: Vol. 1
The Carol Burnett Show: Let's Bump Up the Lights!
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers
Brian Regan: The Epitome of Hyperbole
God's Outlaw: The Story of William Tyndale
Dane Cook: Rough Around the Edges: Live from Madison Square Garden
Bobby Jones: Comedy All Stars: Vol. 1
Outlaugh: The Best of Queer Comedy
Comics on Duty: We Love You, Mrs. Bevins
Jamie Foxx Presents: America's Funniest Comics: Vol. 3
Frank Caliendo: All Over the Place
Jason Stuart: Making It to the Middle
Steven Wright: When the Leaves Blow Away
Suzanne Westenhoefer: A Bottom on Top
Karen Williams: I Need a Snack
Tess: Looking for My Next Ex-Husband

link.synopsis: Chinese superstar You Ge stars as Chen Xiao, a schizophrenic haunted by … a cello case. Chen may have killed his unfaithful wife and buried her body on the beach, and her ghost may be dwelling in the cello case he used to move the body. Haunted by his possible misdeed and tortured by his mental sickness, Chen descends further into madness in this psychological thriller from mainland China, which features a surprising dose of black comedy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Fugitive soldier Elmer (James Denton) teams with lovelorn cowboy Luke (Chris Kattan) to rob a crooked sheriff and skip town with the help of an Apache warrior princess. But robbing the sheriff proves easy compared with surviving a zombie plague that's sweeping the old West! Former "South Park" writer Glasgow Phillips makes his directorial debut with a new twist on that time-honored genre: the zombie western comedy.
link.title: synopsis
From Dusk Till Dawn 2: Texas Blood Money

link.synopsis: Ratings are down for Dale Sweeney (David Alan Basche), host of the conspiracy-themed radio show "Hey, I'll Believe You," but his luck turns when he gets a strange on-air call in a possibly alien language. FBI agents and UFO sightings soon follow. A hilarious supporting cast including Patrick Warburton, Chris Elliott, Mo Rocca and Fred Willard elicits big laughs in this sci-fi comedy by director and co-writer Paul Francis Sullivan.
link.title: synopsis
Dead Like Me: Life After Death
The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill but Came Down a Mountain

link.synopsis: After a young man (R. Pandiaraajan) marries against the wishes of his grandparents (played by S.S. Chandran and Manorama), they ask him to leave their home, and he heads off to start a new life. But hilarity ensues when his grandfather mistakenly believes he has a great-grandson after spotting a baby in the arms of his grandson, who -- hoping for a reconciliation -- promptly rents a child in this Bollywood comedy of errors.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Since he's already engaged to another woman (Kondavalasa), young Veera Shankar (Aryan Rajesh) doesn't know what to do when he falls deeply in love with Arti (Deepika). To escape his problems, he travels to Bangkok, where he mingles with the locals and finds more mayhem than he expected. E.V.V. Satyanarayana directs this Telugu-language romantic comedy packed with fight scenes, laughs and music by Kamalakar.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Madhavan stars as Rajesh, whose deceit may cost him the love of his life in this stylish romantic comedy. Shortly after college, he makes the acquaintance of Reena (Reema Sen) and is instantly bewitched, but her betrothal to a man she's never met scotches Rajesh's plans to pursue her. Prodded by family and friends, he poses as her would-be groom and wins her heart … until her real fiancé (Abbas) -- Rajesh's college rival -- returns from America.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Germ phobic Kip (Robert Gomes) is a veritable recluse, living an obsessive-compulsive life in a Manhattan apartment. But when Celine (Leslie Kendall) moves in next door, Kip falls in love, and for the first time in his life, he might reach out to another person. Celine's psychotic ex-boyfriend, Andy (Frank Deal), however, is not about to let her go so easily. Deborah Gibson co-stars in this award-winning dark comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date
How to Go Out on a Date in Queens

link.synopsis: This brief-but-sweet musical comedy follows the story of an Israeli soldier and a Palestinian woman who fall in love despite the animosity their families have toward each other. Will their love survive as their parents -- feuding West Bank falafel stand owners -- argue and erect a wall between the restaurants? Masterfully directed by Ari Sandel, this Oscar-winning short film stars Ben Newmark, Noureen DeWulf, Assaf Cohen and A.J. Tannen.
link.title: synopsis
The Boys and Girl from County Clare
The Incredibly True Adventure of 2 Girls in Love
The 2006 Academy Award Short Films Collection

link.synopsis: Poor but proud farmer Jeeter Lester (Charley Grapewin), the patriarch of a sprawling Georgia clan, tries to fend off eviction and protect his family during the Great Depression in this classic from director John Ford. Lester's pride drives him to refuse several offers of help, but his lazy lifestyle and equally shiftless relatives do little to help raise enough money to pay the rent in this comedy based on Erskine Caldwell's famed novel.
link.title: synopsis
That Wonderful Urge / Love Is News
Four Men and a Prayer / Seas Beneath
The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: My Little Chickadee

link.synopsis: Out of sheer boredom, slacker soldier Paul (Lennie Burmeister) goes AWOL and takes refuge at his family's bungalow, where he rekindles his romance with an old flame. But it's his brother's sexy girlfriend, Lene (Trine Dyrholm), who catches his eye. Does Lene really have what it takes to reignite his lust for life, or does Paul just want to get back at his difficult brother? David Striesow and Nicole Glaser co-star in this dark comedy.
link.title: synopsis
François Ozon: A Curtain Raiser & Other Shorts
Once Upon a Time in Rio

link.synopsis: In this comedy set in Krakow, a reclusive academic plays tour guide to a Swedish professor with only one thing on his mind -- women. Not exactly the ladies' man, scholarly Gustav (Jerzy Stuhr) must resort to his ex-girlfriends to find a date for the randy Bjorn (Preben Østerfelt). The list of potential dates for Bjorn includes Gustav's old college flame Isa (Stanislawa Celinska). Popular Polish actor Stuhr also wrote and directed.
link.title: synopsis
One Week from a Man's Life
The Wonderful, Horrible Life of Leni Riefenstahl
Psy II / Pigs II: The Last Blood
In Heaven as it is on Earth

link.synopsis: Director Artur Wiecek's otherworldly comedy centers on irresponsible, Elvis-loving angel Giordano (Krzysztof Globisz), who's sent back to Earth by his frustrated superiors and ordered to perform a good deed every day. In Krakow, Giordano faces an uphill battle as he struggles to do all the right things in order to return to heaven and reclaim his angel wings. Grzegorz Dyduch and Kamil Bera also star.
link.title: synopsis
In Heaven as it is on Earth
On the Banks of the Niemen

link.synopsis: After reading a teen magazine, sex-starved aliens disguise themselves as seductive high school girls in search of hunky boys. Outdone by the alien temptresses, Earth girl  Stephanie organizes a resistance movement. But her plan comes to sudden a halt when she learns that her own mother is also one of the sexy invaders. A revisionist remake of the 1967 comedy Mars Needs Women, this cult sexploitation flick inverts the male and female roles.
link.title: synopsis
Flesh Gordon Meets the Cosmic Cheerleaders
Futurama: Into the Wild Green Yonder
5 Dolls for an August Moon / Four Times That Night
The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension

title.regular: The Revenge of the Teenage Vixens from Outer Space

link.synopsis: See how the sitcom started in this collection hailing the early days of TV comedy, featuring five rare shows from the 1950s. Included are Hattie McDaniel in the never-aired "Beulah" and an early episode of "The Jack Benny Show." Plus, see Alan Reed (the voice of Fred Flintstone) in "Duffy's Tavern," an episode of "The Stu Erwin Show" and a pre-"Honeymooners" Jackie Gleason in "The Life of Riley."
link.title: synopsis
The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet: Vol. 9
The Golden Age of TV Drama
If You Could Only Cook / Too Many Husbands
Don't Touch That Dial: TV's Best Commercials
The Golden Age of TV Comedy
Marx Brothers: "You Bet Your Life" Pilot
The American Dream: The Dusty Rhodes Story
Tony Orlando & Dawn: The Ultimate Collection
Louis Armstrong: Greatest Performances of the '30s, '40s, '50s and '60s
A Father ... a Son ... Once Upon a Time in Hollywood
The Tomorrow Show with Tom Snyder: Punk & New Wave
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy
The Very Best of the Honeymooners
Cameraman: The Life and Work of Jack Cardiff
I Love Lucy: Lucy's Really Lost Moments
The Loretta Young Show: Christina's Children Series

link.synopsis: When angels decide to test human nature, everyman George McWhirter Fotheringay (Roland Young) is suddenly given the power to perform miracles. As George uses his gift and tries to create his idea of utopia, his acts are met with disbelief. But his biggest miracle quiets the skeptics and turns the world on its ear. Ralph Richardson, Edward Chapman, Ernest Thesiger and Joan Gardner also star in this comedy fantasy based on the book by H.G. Wells.
link.title: synopsis
The Man Who Fell to Earth
The Man Who Came to Dinner
A Matter of Life and Death
I Married a Monster from Outer Space
My Sister Eileen / She Wouldn't Say Yes

title.regular: The Man Who Could Work Miracles
title.short: The Man Who Could Work Miracles

link.synopsis: Seven years after hiding their loot in an abandoned mansion, a team of train robbers is surprised to learn that the building has become the new home to St. Trinian's, an all-girls high school whose fearless student body bands together against the crooks. Frankie Howerd stars as the gang leader in this beloved British comedy caper, the fourth in a series of films detailing the adventures of the girls of St. Trinian's.
link.title: synopsis
The Pure Hell of St. Trinian's
The Great St. Louis Bank Robbery
20th Century Boys: Chapter 2: The Last Hope
Harry and Walter Go to New York

title.regular: The Great St. Trinian's Train Robbery
title.short: The Great St. Trinian's Train Robbery

link.synopsis: Juliet Mills plays Joanna Jones, the new village nurse in the tiny town of Blandley, in this British romantic comedy. The pert and perky Joanna soon learns she'll have to work to earn the respect of the villagers, who're suspicious of her youth. Little by little, though, she converts the locals -- starting with the wealthy farmer (Ronald Lewis) whose car she crashes into on her way to her first round of appointments.
link.title: synopsis
Not On Your Nellie: The Complete First Series
Steve Gadd: American Drummers Achievement Awards
Tammy Tell Me True / Tammy and the Doctor
How to Stuff a Wild Bikini

link.synopsis: A hardworking orphan (Ganesh) grows up to become an engineer, but when he tries to expand his business to pay for his sister's expensive wedding, a fire destroys everything. Now, he must draw on all his resources to rebuild his life. Meanwhile, an accidental exchange of cell phones sparks a new relationship with a wealthy young woman (Rekha). M.D. Sridhar directs this Indian comedy, co-starring Devaraj, Avinash, Komal and Rangayana Raghu.
link.title: synopsis
President Barack Obama: The Man and His Journey

link.synopsis: In this hilarious romantic comedy, Yuvakrishna and Ankitha head the cast as students who fall madly in love -- until a misunderstanding drives a wedge between them. When their families try to force them into an arranged marriage, will the couple kiss and make up, or will they allow their stubbornness to destroy their chance at happiness? Vivek, Nirosha, Pravin Mani and M.S. Vishwanathan also star.
link.title: synopsis
Kiss Me Quick / House on Bare Mountain

link.synopsis: Mixing musical comedy with an inspirational message, stand-up comic Anita Renfroe mines motherhood for beaucoup laughs, holding forth on maternity clothing, prenatal visits, Botox, the Lactation Fairy and more. Her electrifying live show features her hit bit "Momisms," in which the prodigious performer takes three minutes to recount everything a mom says in 24 hours -- all to the tune of the "William Tell" Overture.
link.title: synopsis
Ken Davis: Is It Just Me?
Ken Davis Live: I'm Not Okay
Belle and the Beast: A Christian Romance
Don't Touch That Dial: TV's Best Commercials
Gabrielle Reece: Fit & Healthy Prenatal Workouts
Anita Renfroe: It's Probably Just My Thyroid
Dane Cook: Rough Around the Edges: Live from Madison Square Garden
Bobby Jones: Comedy All Stars: Vol. 1
Outlaugh: The Best of Queer Comedy
Comics on Duty: We Love You, Mrs. Bevins
Jamie Foxx Presents: America's Funniest Comics: Vol. 3
Frank Caliendo: All Over the Place
Jason Stuart: Making It to the Middle
Steven Wright: When the Leaves Blow Away
Suzanne Westenhoefer: A Bottom on Top
TK Kirkland: Are There Any Questions?
Karen Williams: I Need a Snack
Tess: Looking for My Next Ex-Husband

link.synopsis: Mario Bava helms this double feature comprising works from the early 1970s. In the thriller 5 Dolls for an August Moon, a group of investors on a remote island fall victim to an unknown killer. In the comedy Four Times That Night, Gianni (Brett Halsey) and Tina (Daniela Giordano) dish about their date gone wrong, while the doorman and a professor pitch in their two cents on the unfortunate situation.
link.title: synopsis
The Girl Who Knew Too Much
All the Colors of the Dark
What Have You Done to Solange?
The Giallo Collection: The Bloodstained Shadow
The Whip and the Body / Conspiracy of Torture
A Lizard in a Woman's Skin
The Virgo, The Taurus and The Capricorn
The Black Belly of the Tarantula
The Bird with the Crystal Plumage
The Giallo Collection: Who Saw Her Die?

title.regular: 5 Dolls for an August Moon / Four Times That Night
title.short: 5 Dolls for ... / Four Times That Night

link.synopsis: After his girlfriend dumps him, 30-something Steven (Ron Menzel) falls for hospital volunteer Maria (Heidi Fellner) in this offbeat romantic comedy. Steven's outlook improves, but there's a catch -- to keep seeing Maria, he must pretend that he has a rare disease. Living a lie begins to take its toll as he falls deeper in love and struggles with the reality that he can't keep up the charade forever.
link.title: synopsis
Jack and Jill vs. the World
How to Go Out on a Date in Queens
Luke and Brie Are on a First Date

link.synopsis: When three slackers in need of gainful employment somehow stumble into jobs with the Atlanta Police Department, they're thrown into the fire and expected to keep the peace. But these unskilled rookies are hardly equipped to deal with the likes of petty thieves and diamond smugglers who've made crime their life. Dwayne Carl, David Vallin and Jevocas Green co-star in this urban comedy of hilarious proportions.
link.title: synopsis
Kathy Griffin: My Life on the D-List
The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning
The Longshot / They Went That-A-Way & That-A-Way

link.synopsis: Martial arts star Jackie Chan plays a negative character for the first time in this film that casts him as a compulsive gambler caught up in a kidnapping scheme. It turns out, however, that Fong (Chan) does have a heart, and when he's left tending the tot, a strong bond develops. Now, he just has to fend off the baddies, protect the child and try to stay out of jail in this deftly choreographed action comedy from Benny Chan.
link.title: synopsis
Half a Loaf of Kung Fu

link.synopsis: When a recently divorced man (Eduard Fernández) and a single mother of two (Ana Belén) discover in each other a second chance at love, high jinks ensue, as old flames and family ties converge to complicate the fledgling romance. Director Manuel Gómez Pereira's wry comedy takes a satirical look at the thorny tangles of modern relationships and the calamity we're willing to endure in the name of love.
link.title: synopsis
Dios te Bendiga Hijo Mío: Santa Martha Acatitla Penitenciaria
No Dejare Que No Me Quieras

link.synopsis: A close-knit yet unusual family -- headed by an irresponsible bohemian father (Antonio Resines) and a devoted mother (Verónica Forqué) -- embarks on an unforgettable summer in an Ibiza beach house in 1970 and finds each of their lives thrown for a loop. Co-written and directed by filmmaker Manuel Iborra, this heartwarming comedy is a hilarious portrait of a family in the midst of sweeping cultural change.
link.title: synopsis
Schoolgirl Report: Vol. 6: What Parents Would Gladly Hush Up
De Que Se Rien Las Mujeres?
The Other Side of the Bed
What Have I Done to Deserve This?

link.synopsis: Based on a true story, this action-packed comedy follows four overworked Colombian soldiers who stumble upon $46 million while on a rescue mission in the jungle and decide to keep the cash for themselves rather than turn it in to the government. With their only route home destroyed by rebels, the soldiers work feverishly to get back to civilization so they can take advantage of their newfound fortune.
link.title: synopsis
Dios los Junta y Ellos Se Separan
Love in the Time of Cholera
Si Honraras a Tu Coca Madre
La Muerte del Gallo de Oro
1888: El Extraordinario Viaje de la Santa Isabel

link.synopsis: Just as their father kicks them out of the house, slacker brothers Chuttan and Puttan fall in love with beautiful Shaila and Poonam. Desperate to prove their love despite their lack of resources, they plan an elaborate ruse to fake Puttan's murder. But when Puttan really disappears and a body turns up, Chuttan runs out of ideas. Vinod Mehra, Mehmood, Aruna Irani and Ashok Kumar star in this madcap classic comedy.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Sandeep and his servant Sevak make their first trip to the small village of Shikarpur on business and are perplexed when everyone there seems to know them. By astounding coincidence, both men have twins, also named Sandeep and Sevak, in Shikarpur. Fate conspires to put each set of twins in the wrong place at the wrong time, resulting in hilarious confusion. Kishore Kumar and Asit Sen star in Debu Sen's uproarious comedy of mistaken identity.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: For John Lennon (Justin Ipock) and David Mayhews (Kelly Fisher), turning 30 requires more change than either expected. Living in cyberspace, John realizes that real love and life are passing him by. And David's dream of rock stardom may have to yield to the 9-to-5 grind. But growing up doesn't necessarily mean growing old. Rollence Patugan, Lee Whittaker, April Wade and Sarah Andrews star in this touching comedy directed by Peter Bruno.
link.title: synopsis
Glow Ropes: The Rise and Fall of a Bar Mitzvah Emcee
Dave Barry's Complete Guide to Guys
Donald and Dot Clock Found Dead in Their Home

link.synopsis: Hoping to craft the winning entry in a student film competition, teenage movie geek Cameron (Michael Angarano) enlists the help of an ornery old Hollywood gaffer named Flash (Christopher Plummer), who happens to be the last surviving crew member of Orson Welles's masterpiece Citizen Kane. Written and directed by Michael Shroeder, this unusual comedy also stars Robert Wagner as a has-been producer and M. Emmet Walsh as a retired screenwriter.
link.title: synopsis
Divine Secrets of the Ya-Ya Sisterhood
A Love Song for Bobby Long
Marilyn Hotchkiss Ballroom Dancing and Charm School

link.synopsis: Director Tom Putnam's romantic comedy stars Paris Hilton as Cristabelle Abbott, a beautiful girl pursued by her lovesick childhood chum Nate Cooper (Joel Moore). Cristabelle eventually agrees to go out with Nate -- but only if he can find a beau for her unattractive best pal, June Phigg (Christine Lakin). First, however, June gets a head-to-toe makeover, and soon Nate begins to see her in a different light as her true beauty emerges.
link.title: synopsis
National Lampoon Presents: One, Two, Many
Celebrity News Reels: Best of Paris
The Dukes of Hazzard: The Beginning
The Mostly Unfabulous Social Life of Ethan Green
I Now Pronounce You Chuck and Larry
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back

link.synopsis: Social misfit and self-labeled "troll from under the bridge" Keith Sontag (Dore Mann) lives a sad and lonely existence in this disturbing black comedy -- an Independent Spirit Award nominee -- from director Ronald Bronstein. When he's not trying to sell coupons door-to-door, Keith struggles with evicting his roommate from their seedy apartment, helping a friend who's suicidal and just getting by as an outsider in the cruel city.
link.title: synopsis
Six Sex Scenes and a Murder
The 2005 Academy Award Short Films Collection
How to Kill Your Neighbor's Dog

link.synopsis: Lovable loser Curtis Prentiss (Billy Crudup) enlists the help of his friend Kenny (David Hornsby) and ornery scientist Rick (Paul Giamatti) to build a rocket belt, which Curtis firmly believes will make him famous. But the partners soon learn that business and friendship don't mix. Too much ambition can be a dangerous thing, especially when it leads to murder, kidnapping and prison. This dark comedy marks actor Paul Schneider's directorial debut.
link.title: synopsis
What If God Were the Sun?
Assassination of a High School President
The Saddest Music in the World

link.synopsis: Crime definitely does not pay for the characters of this cool comedy, which features a rogue's gallery of hapless crooks and old scoundrels. Whether trying to rob a roadside diner or kidnap a wealthy man's daughter, these hoods are totally inept. With a nod to both American and French films, this humorous look at the lighter side of crime employs and subverts classic thriller conventions. Jean Rochefort, Sergi López and Anna Mouglalis star.
link.title: synopsis
I Do: How to Get Married and Stay Single
How Much Do You Love Me?
In the Arms of My Enemy

title.regular: I Always Wanted to Be a Gangster
title.short: I Always Wanted to Be a Gangster

link.synopsis: Fleeing her high-stress lifestyle, Taeko (Satomi Kobayashi) hops a flight to a remote island, where, at first, she thinks the natives are completely crazy. Soon, however, she begins to see their charm and learns to go with the flow. Set in Japan, this fun comedy is populated with endearing characters who colorfully underscore the importance of taking time to really enjoy life.
link.title: synopsis
When the Last Sword Is Drawn
Vermilion Pleasure Night: Vol. 1: Optic Erotica
Attack Girls' Swim Team vs. the Undead

link.synopsis: Suffering from a neurological disorder that causes him to periodically enter a trancelike state, sheltered teen Samuel (Juan José Ballesta) has difficulty forging connections with people. But when he unexpectedly winds up in Madrid, his life takes a surprising turn. He meets a quirky young woman, Consuelo (Adriana Ugarte), and the two form an unusual relationship in this offbeat Spanish comedy from writer-director Santi Amodeo.
link.title: synopsis
Tu Que Harias Por Amor: Just Run!
The Other Side of the Bed
Todas Las Azafatas Van Al Cielo

link.synopsis: To get out of a ticket, television writer Miguel (Mauricio Isaac) gives away a secret about his hit series to a police officer. But the boastful cop, Bracho (Dagoberto Gama), feels humiliated in front of his friends when he discovers the information is false -- and vows revenge. As Bracho's fury grows, so does his appetite for violence in this surreal Mexican comedy directed by Sergio Umansky.
link.title: synopsis
Juan, I Forgot I Don't Remember
Donde Quedo La Abuela? El Viaje De La Nonna

title.regular: It's Better if Gabriela Doesn't Die
title.short: It's Better if Gabriela Doesn't Die

link.synopsis: After they're accidentally dropped on a remote Australian beach rather than an area near Perth as intended, a trio of Iraqi and Cambodian refugees find themselves wandering through a vast desert in this black comedy. Unlikely companions Yousif Al-Samer (Rodney Afif), Arun (Kenneth Moraleda) and Ramelan (Sri Sacdpraseuth) band together to find their way out of the outback … without a map and with only one bottle of water.
link.title: synopsis
If It's Tuesday, It Still Must be Belgium
Comics on Duty: We Love You, Mrs. Bevins
Katt Williams: American Hustle: The Movie
Ryan and Sean's Not So Excellent Adventure
Benny Bliss & the Disciples of Greatness
I Hope They Serve Beer in Hell
Harold and Kumar Go to White Castle
Basic Black: The Lewis Black Story

link.synopsis: When they hear he's due to appear at a Utah screening, Western actors Mel Torres (Del Zamora) and Fred Fletcher (Ed Pansullo) concoct a plan for revenge on screenwriter Fritz Frobisher, who terrorized them years ago when they were child extras on a movie set. They set off on a road trip to Monument Valley -- the site of John Ford's celebrated classics -- with a plan to confront their nemesis in this offbeat comedy from Alex Cox (Repo Man).
link.title: synopsis
My Wife Is a Gambling Maestro
Tristram Shandy: A Cock and Bull Story

link.synopsis: Wheelchair-bound after an accident, paraplegic Geirr (Fridtjov Såheim) spends his days isolated and bitter. When his girlfriend (Kirsti Eline Torhaug) invites uber-positive National Health psychologist Tori (Kjersti Holmen) to their house to help, it sets the stage for an epic showdown between the two. Bård Breien directs this black comedy from Norway, which co-stars Henrik Mestad and Marian Saastad Ottesen.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: With his obsessive perfectionism, cafeteria manager Jan (Lars Brygmann) alienates his co-workers on the ferryboat where he works, and his relationship with his violent and bitter wife (Sidse Babett Knudsen) is even worse. But things change when he joins a spousal abuse therapy group. Jan's new friendships with wife-beaters Rudy (Nicolaj Kopernikus) and Alf (Rasmus Bjerg) lead him down an unexpected path in this black comedy from Denmark.
link.title: synopsis
Pusher 3: I'm the Angel of Death
Pusher 2: With Blood on My Hands

link.synopsis: Ram (Kamal Hassan), a married airline pilot with a history of infidelity, falls into a drunken depression after his wife leaves him. His pals try to raise his spirits by arranging a tryst with a dancer, but Ram realizes he loves his wife and walks out on the girl. Things take an unexpected turn when he and his pals return to her hotel room and discover her in a pool of blood. Now, they must try to hide her body in this black comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: There's only one thing brothers Stone (Ian Reed Kesler) and Ed (Travis Wester) love as much as marijuana, and that's each other. So when they find out they might not be related, they set out on a quest to locate Stone's mother. Along the way, the guys get caught up in a war between Mexican drug lords and CIA operatives, encounter a blond bombshell in handcuffs and run into an assortment of wacky characters in this comedy from Adam Meyerowitz.
link.title: synopsis
I Got Five on It Too
National Lampoon Presents: One, Two, Many
Dumb and Dumberer: When Harry Met Lloyd
Harold & Kumar Escape from Guantanamo Bay
Harold and Kumar Go to White Castle
Jay and Silent Bob Strike Back

link.synopsis: Sharing a child and a former marriage, Julia (Jenny McCarthy) and Jack (Matt Keeslar) remain madly in love; too bad they don't know it. What they need is a little divine intervention -- and they may just get it. When Jack's golf ball knocks an elderly man (Gene Bicknell) unconscious, the amnesiac who awakens seems to work miracles on everyone he encounters. But will his magic extend to Jack and Julia in this romantic comedy?
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Writer-director Neil Mandt's indie road movie follows lifelong buddies Charlie (Mandt) and Cliff (Marc Carter) as they embark on an outrageous globe-hopping journey to scatter the ashes of their friend Paul from one end of the world to the other. Choosing a loose, cinema vérité style, Mandt eschewed convention in shooting the comedy, working without a script or production schedule and capturing true spontaneity through improvised performance.
link.title: synopsis
Kathy Griffin: My Life on the D-List
Search and Rescue / River of Rage

link.synopsis: Director Lorraine Senna's modern take on "Pygmalion" follows a sweet-natured Sikh girl named Shalini Singh (Namrata Singh Gujral), who's targeted by a wannabe Los Angeles talent agent eager to transform her into the next big Hollywood sensation. This charming East-meets-West romantic comedy also stars Beau Bridges, Phillip Rhys, Wil Wheaton, Brad Raider and RonReaco Lee.
link.title: synopsis
The Other End of the Line
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year
Mozart on Tour: Frankfurt, Munich, Vienna
Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day
You Don't Mess with the Zohan
Did You Hear About the Morgans?

link.synopsis: Defiant 18-year-old Adela León (Martha Higareda) pushes her father and an unbending headmistress to the limit in this delicious comedy from Mexico. Fearing his daughter's behavior will destroy his run for governor, Adela's dad sends her to charm school for an attitude adjustment -- putting her on a collision course with determined school administrator Maca Ribera (Blanca Guerra). Camila Sodi and Rafael Sánchez Navarro also star.
link.title: synopsis
Crypt of Terror: Horror from South of the Border: Vol. 1
Wait for Me in Another World

link.synopsis: Master performer Jackie Gleason ruled 1950s TV comedy with his beloved and influential "The Jackie Gleason Show"; the Great One's comic legacy is explored in this documentary, which includes a special appearance by Gleason's wife, Marilyn. With keen commentary by host Jeff Garlin, the program collects various classic sketches featuring such characters as playboy Reggie Van Gleason, Rudy the Repairman, bus-driving dreamer Ralph Kramden and more.
link.title: synopsis
The Very Best of the Honeymooners
The Life & Death of Peter Sellers
Red Files: Secrets of the Russian Archives
Agile, Mobile, Hostile: A Year with Andre Williams
Young & Handsome: An Evening with Jeff Garlin
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Commercial Parodies
Beer: The Movie 2: Leaving Long Island
Studio 60 on the Sunset Strip: The Complete Series
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Jimmy Fallon
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Dan Aykroyd
Saturday Night Live: The Best of John Belushi
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Will Ferrell: Vol. 3
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Amy Poehler
Saturday Night Live: The Best of Tom Hanks
The Carol Burnett Show: Show Stoppers

link.synopsis: After suffering a humiliating defeat on the field, the members of a working-class soccer team believe all hope is lost. But when the mysterious Walter Keegan (Brendan Gleeson) offers to coach them, things start to look up. The new coach is a fierce disciplinarian who drills the out-of-shape players mercilessly, pushing them toward sharpening their skills … and maybe even winning a game. David Wilmot co-stars in this winning Irish comedy.
link.title: synopsis
The 2005 Academy Award Short Films Collection
St. Martin's Lane / Wings of the Morning: Double Feature
El Penalti Mas Largo Del Mundo
David Beckham: Life of an Icon

link.synopsis: Three buddies think they've found party paradise when they land a great deal on a Hollywood Hills mansion. They've been warned that the home has a gruesome history, but really, they insist, what's the worst that could happen? Well, for one, the residence they hoped would be a babe magnet turns out to be an evil magnet -- an actual portal to hell. Nightmare on Elm Street star Robert Englund directs this horror comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Hell House: The Book of Samiel
Blood Feast 2: All U Can Eat
Exorcism: The Possession of Gail Bowers
J-ok'el: La Llorona: Curse of the Weeping Woman

link.synopsis: When an evil organization begins killing fashion models to try to bring down the silk industry, the government calls upon "Mistress of the Martial Arts" Awesome Lotus (Lorraine Masterson) to solve the case. By her side is right-hand man Tofu Caca (Peter Schuyler), a blind, deaf-mute martial arts expert with a penchant for opera singing. David O'Malley's over-the-top action comedy has more than its fair share of gratuitous skin and violence.
link.title: synopsis
Surge of Power: The Stuff of Heroes
The Man with One Red Shoe
Who Framed Roger Rabbit?: Special Edition

link.synopsis: The great Jackie Gleason and Art Carney reprise their roles as Ralph Kramden and sidekick Ed Norton in this incarnation of "The Jackie Gleason Show," which aired on CBS in the late 1960s. Sheila MacRae and Jane Kean take over the roles of Alice and Trixie, and special guests appear in this fun mix of comedy series and variety show. Other regulars include the June Taylor Dancers, Sammy Spear and his Orchestra and announcer Johnny Olson.
link.title: synopsis
Sgt. Bilko: The Phil Silvers Show: Season 1
The Jack Benny Show: Collector's Edition
Bobby Vinton: Live: Songs From My Heart
W.C. Fields Comedy Collection: My Little Chickadee
Smothers Brothers Comedy Hour: The Best of Season 2
The Carol Burnett Show: Let's Bump Up the Lights!
The I Love Lucy 50th Anniversary Special
I Love Lucy: Lucy's Really Lost Moments
The Very Best of the Honeymooners
My Favorite Martian: Time Travelers Favorites
The George Burns & Gracie Allen Show

link.synopsis: Laugh along with six episodes from one of Indian television's biggest comedy hits. Ranjit (Shafi Inamdar) and Renu (Swaroop Sampat) try to keep their marriage afloat while coping with Renu's slacker brother Raja (Rakesh Bedi) and a variety of characters played by show regular Satish Shah. This collection includes the episodes "The Divorce," "The Sofa Cum Bed," "Renu as a Sales Girl," the two-part "The South Indian Marriage" and "Cancer."
link.title: synopsis
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year

link.synopsis: Laugh along with six episodes from one of Indian television's biggest comedy hits. Ranjit (Shafi Inamdar) and Renu (Swaroop Sampat) try to keep their marriage afloat while coping with Renu's slacker brother Raja (Rakesh Bedi) and a variety of characters played by show regular Satish Shah. This collection includes the episodes "Guess Who's Coming to Dinner?," "Raja Falls in Love" and the two-parters "Women's Liberation" and "Thief's Sweet Tooth."
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Laugh along with six episodes from one of Indian television's biggest comedy hits. Ranjit (Shafi Inamdar) and Renu (Swaroop Sampat) try to keep their marriage afloat while coping with Renu's slacker younger brother Raja (Rakesh Bedi) and a variety of characters played by show regular Satish Shah. This collection includes the episodes "Blackmail," the two-part "Pregnancy," "Raja as a Salesman," "Smugglers' Den" and "War of Uncles."
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Laugh along with six episodes from one of Indian television's biggest comedy hits. Ranjit (Shafi Inamdar) and Renu (Swaroop Sampat) try to keep their marriage afloat while coping with Renu's slacker brother Raja (Rakesh Bedi) and a variety of characters played by show regular Satish Shah. This collection includes the episodes "The Antique Gift," "Truth or Lies?," "Double Trouble," "Marital Rift," "The Cooking Range" and "New Member Arrives."
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: In this Bollywood comedy, good friends (but errant husbands) Sreeram (Rajendraprasad), Chandu (Sivaji) and Ram Babu (Brahmanandam) are about to get their comeuppance thanks to a damsel in distress. When the guys take a break from boozing and misbehavior to rescue a pretty woman (Rambha), they claim to be bachelors, and she promises to wed the one who impresses her most … but their wives have something else in mind.
link.title: synopsis
Sree Seetha Ramula Kalyanam Chutamu Raarandi

link.synopsis: Overwhelmed by the attention he receives from the women who come into his shop, beauty parlor owner Raghava (Srikanth) asks his assistant to tell everyone he's married. But the plan backfires when Raghava falls for one of the girls (Sindhu Tolani) who thinks he's taken. A comedy of errors ensues as the misunderstandings multiply, and it's up to Raghava's business partner, Subba Rao (Rajendra Prasad), to unite the two lovers.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: Joined by best buddies, bitter rivals and sexy female classmates, troublemaker Jorgito (Jorge Ortiz de Pinedo) returns for another laugh-out-loud season of this hit Mexican comedy series that features the outrageous antics of adults dressing and acting like schoolchildren. Constantly struggling to keep the rowdy pupils in line, the classroom's two harried teachers are often forced to use their paddles to maintain order.
link.title: synopsis
Jennifer Lopez Presents: Como Ama Una Mujer
South Pacific: In Concert From Carnegie Hall
And Starring Pancho Villa as Himself
El Coronel No Tiene Quien Le Escriba
A Good Death Beats a Dull Life
Cuentos De Hadas Para Dormir Cocodrilos
Entre La Tarde y La Noche

link.synopsis: In fast-paced corporate India, four friends -- played by Vir Das, Dilip Tadeshwar, Indraneil Sengupta and Ray Irani -- have little time for love but plenty of time for one-night stands in this quirky romantic comedy. Despite their commitment phobia, however, the foursome (who meet regularly at a pub called Mumbai Salsa) soon find themselves embroiled in increasingly complicated relationships with a quartet of young ladies.
link.title: synopsis
Kal Ho Naa Ho: Tomorrow May Never Come

link.synopsis: A small-time English crook tries to move up in the underworld by attempting to take over a family-owned pub near the Irish coast. But his plans soon begin to crumble when the plucky locals refuse to accept his takeover bid lying down. Will life in this small town ever be the same again? Directed and co-written by Mike Scullion, this dark comedy features Larry Austin, Karl Argue, Kathy Ranheim, Jamie Belton and Shaun Elebert.
link.title: synopsis
Tarzan and His Mate / Tarzan Finds a Son!
The Art of Soccer with John Cleese

link.synopsis: When an Omaha, Neb., family piles into an RV and heads to the wilds of California for their dream vacation, nightmares soon ensue. One mishap after another befalls the out-of-their-element suburbanites, but they're determined to prevail -- and perhaps learn some lessons along the way in this National Lampoon-style comedy starring Dave Foley, Lea Thompson, Patricia Richardson and Vicki Lewis, and directed by Linda Voorhees.
link.title: synopsis
NFL Cheerleaders: Making the Squad: San Diego Chargers
Youssou N'Dour: I Bring What I Love
Journey to the Center of the Earth
Doctor Who: Planet of the Dead

link.synopsis: The eponymous star of "The Bob Newhart Show" returns to television as a writer of how-to books in the first season of this ensemble comedy. Newhart plays Dick Loudon, who's left New York City with his wife (Mary Frann) to manage a quaint inn in Vermont. Handyman George Utley (Tom Poston) and maid Leslie Vanderkellen (Jennifer Holmes) lead the supporting cast of quirky characters who make sure there's never a dull moment in the sleepy little town.
link.title: synopsis
One Day at a Time: Season 1
Not On Your Nellie: The Complete First Series
The Funny Blokes of British Comedy
Chico and the Man: TV Favorites

link.synopsis: This clever film noir comedy from Bollywood stars Neil Nitin Mukesh as Vikram, the youngest of five thugs who double-crosses his partners with a plan to make off with a big score -- and the wife of another gang member. Preparing to steal the dough and start a new life abroad, Vikram realizes he must not only outwit his partners to get the prize, but at some point, he'll have to kill them, too.
link.title: synopsis
Rocket Singh: Salesman of the Year

link.synopsis: Ex-cop Narasimha (Mohanlal) hires a pair of best friends, Raj (Prashant Raj) and Heero (Ajay Devgan), to find and capture crime boss Babban (Amitabh Bachchan), the man who killed Narasimha's family. But while training to defeat Babban, the two young men get distracted by falling in love. This Bollywood crime comedy, which references world political affairs including the U.S. war in Iraq, is an adaptation of the classic Indian film Sholay.
link.title: synopsis

link.synopsis: When Chuy (Pedro Infante) goes to the train station to pick up his fiancée, Felicidad (Consuelo Guerrero de Luna), he discovers that she's been corrupted by feminist ideas. Hoping to put her back on track, Chuy tries to teach his future wife that women belong at home and men are in charge. Co-writer Carlos Orellana stars in and directs this politically incorrect Mexican comedy that focuses on the age-old battle of the sexes.
link.title: synopsis
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Mexicanos al Grito de Guerra
Coleccion Pedro Infante: La Mujer Que Yo Perdi
Coleccion Pedro Infante: Las Islas Marias

title.regular: Coleccion Pedro Infante: Arriba las Mujeres

link.synopsis: Director John Banovich's riotous family comedy chronicles the farcical misadventures of hapless video-store clerk Albert (Adam Gregory) and his dimwitted co-worker buddies, George (Sean O. Roberts) and Ernie (Simeon Taole). When Albert's dream girl walks into the workplace, he enlists the help of his two moronic pals to attract her attention. Elizabeth Thai, Michael Roberds and Samantha McLeod also star.
link.title: synopsis
American Pie Presents: The Book of Love

link.synopsis: After his engagement is called off, Nick Jenkins (Austin Peck) finds himself thrust back into the dating world in this smart indie comedy. With help from his roommate and best friend, Jed Rollins (Stefan Marc), Nick braves the sometimes scary and often confusing singles scene. Soon, he's torn between continuing to have fun as a player or settling down. Leslie Bega, Rick Scarry and Stephanie Brown co-star.
link.title: synopsis
You Will Meet a Tall Dark Stranger
Mating Habits of the Earthbound Human

link.synopsis: Jackie Gleason stars as New Jersey caterer Walter Hollander, whose vacation to Europe goes haywire after his family's plane is hijacked to Vulgaria and he's mistaken for an international agent in this screwball comedy based on a Woody Allen play. With Vulgarian spies on their trail, the Hollanders take refuge in the American embassy and must disguise themselves as Arab diplomats to sneak out of the country.
link.title: synopsis
The Russians Are Coming, The Russians Are Coming
It's a Mad, Mad, Mad, Mad World
Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines
Harlan: In the Shadow of Jew Süss
If It's Tuesday, This Must Be Belgium
What Did You Do in the War, Daddy?
Tony Orlando & Dawn: The Ultimate Collection

link.synopsis: Set during World War II, director Ken Annakin's mordant British comedy stars James Robertson Justice as a cantankerous, conceited scientist who's incarcerated after his plane is shot down in enemy territory. When his fellow prisoners discover that his radar invention is of strategic importance, they conspire to help him escape at all costs. The supporting cast includes Leslie Phillips, Stanley Baxter and Eric Sykes.
link.title: synopsis
Kavanagh Q.C.: Nothing But the Truth
King and Country / Angels One Five
Unseen Cinema: Early American Avant-Garde Film 1894-1941

The Wrong Arm of the Law
A Hard Day's Night: Collector's Series
The Knack...and How to Get It
Don't Worry, We'll Think of a Title
Boy, Did I Get a Wrong Number!
Those Magnificent Men in Their Flying Machines

link.synopsis: Pushed by his mother, high school senior Peter (Topher Hopkins) works as a grocery clerk and a paperboy to earn money for college. But when sultry Sally (Darlene Demko) invites the sexually inexperienced Peter over for some unwholesome fun, school is the last thing on his mind. Sally and her friend Randy (Rene Orobello) introduce Peter to a kinky world he can't get enough of in this raunchy teen sex comedy.
link.title: synopsis
South Beach Academy / Rock 'n' Roll High School Forever
She Likes Girls 4: Tomboys & Tough Girls
House Party 4: Down to the Last Minute

link.synopsis: After surviving a near-fatal bus accident, four women vow to stay friends forever. When one of them, Res (Candy Pangilinan), is killed by her Hong Kong employer, the other women take her body back to the Philippines and pretend she's still alive. After all, if Res's husband were to find out that his wife was dead, there's no telling what he might do. Rufa Mae Quinto, Eugene Domingo and Pokwang also star in this Filipino comedy.
link.title: synopsis
Judy Ann & Ryan 2-in-1: Rosaryo / Inday Bote
Enteng Kabisote 3: Okay Ka Fairy Ko
All About Love: Ang Sarap Ma-In Love
